transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon boliye.
Executive: Mai keh raha tha sir aapka naam puchna bhula tha.
Customer: Mera naam Rajkishore Prusti.
Executive: Ji sir, Rajkishore?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Achha Rajkishore ji.
Executive: Kishore ji mai abhi kya karunga aapko apna number se aapko text bhi kar dunga jaise aapka koi query concern aata hai ki lead galat hai ya kuch bhi changes kar rahe ho aur changes nahi ho rahe hain na kisi bhi tarike ka problem hai to aap immediately screenshot share kar doge to mujhe idea lag jayega ki kis jagah pe aap problem face kar rahe ho hai ki nahi aur further ab aap changes to kar hi loge aapko thoda idea lag hi gaya hai hai na aur aur koi query concerns hai bahut sare products out of stock mark kiya hai shayad aapne.
Customer: Abhi hum bahut sare product abhi update kar rahe hain, thik hai na.
Executive: Jaise mujhe ye janna hai ki finile concern ke drone white finile ye sab pehle karte the kya?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Namkeen namkeen mein.
Customer: Abhi namkeen mein abhi bahut sara product add hua hai aur jo bhi product galat vagaira hai usko bhi hum abhi.
Executive: Wo to aap update kar loge jahan problem aayegi mujhe bata dijiyega. Ek feedback sir aayega mere liye aapke pass.
Customer: Haan, mail pe.
Executive: To please mention kar dijiyega ki matlab Ashraf se discussion ho gaya tha aur sara unhone bata diya hai aur rating to aapko bata hi diya replies ka maine aapko bata hi diya ki replies bahut jyada jaruri hai hai na call picking rate aapki thik hai utni kharab nahi hai kyuki 90 days ke 85% average aata hai hai na 85% aapke website pe show karta hai.
Customer: Thik hai baki aur further koi query concern hoga to abhi mai aapko text kare de raha hu whatsapp pe to mujhe aap bhejiye ga waha pe hai na Rajkishore ji.
Executive: Thik hai sir mere liye feedback sir jarur fill kar dijiyega company mein jata hai hai na ki mai aapko bataya ki nahi hai na.
Customer: Haan wo to hum feedback nahi abhi mai mere boss ke sath baat kar raha hu isko leke wo bole ki haan boss bole ki boss ja rahe hain hum log yaha pe campaign pada hai camp laga hua hai aise ki business mein camp jo hota hai.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Haan Bali yatra mein jo hota hai katak mein.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: To waha pe humara boss udhar gaye hain wo bola ki hum ja ke ek bar free ho ke dekh lenge uske baad wo usko close kara denge jo complaint ticket kiya hua tha thik hai na.
Executive: Jo hai aapka yaha pe haan hello.
Customer: Haan wo ek bar check karke wo hum log mere ko phone aayega.
Executive: Kyu sir unko wo aap bata nahi paoge sir ki mujhe pata hai ki kaise update karna hai catalog.
Customer: Mai to bata diya hu thik hai abhi fir bhi unko thoda dekhna padega wo bole ki hum thoda hum check kara denge uske baad fir hum bolenge isliye to hum usko agar abhi hum thoda udhar busy hain aur thoda matlab hame.
Executive: Are to mera number mai aapko de raha hu na aapko problem lage to mai kar lenge.
Customer: Ji sir mai samajh sakta hu mai janta hu is details iske bare mein fir bhi humko boss to upar hai na wo hum logo kara denge to humko upar se matlab kya hoga aap jante hain to thoda boss thoda check karne dijiye na wo abhi baat kar chuka hu unke sath thoda check karke wo kara denge bolenge to hum direct udhar se wo kara lenge nahi to hum idhar se direct kara denge thik hai.
Executive: Ab fir wo kaise aap bataoge mujhe whatsapp pe batayenge aap.
Customer: Haan haan haan aapka ye mera whatsapp number hai aap thoda.
Executive: Haan haan mai whatsapp pe abhi hello kar raha hu whatsapp pe aapko hello kar raha hu fir mai aapse update leta hu.
Customer: Thik thik thik thank you sir thank you welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has many products marked out of stock.

- Customer needs assistance with updating catalog.

- Customer's boss wants to review before closing ticket.



Resolution:

- Executive offered assistance via WhatsApp.

- Executive requested feedback after the call.

- Executive shared his contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update after boss reviews.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, update, whatsapp, feedback
